articles.description: THE DROWNING kicked off on Channel 5 on Monday night to tell one grieving mother's desperate search for answers following the disappearance of her son. But have fans already worked out which way the series is heading?

articles.title: Charli XCX pays tribute to SOPHIE: “I love you and will never forget you” - NME
articles.description: Charli XCX has paid tribute to SOPHIE, following the Scottish DJ and producer’s death this weekend (January 30).
articles.content:
Charli XCX has paid tribute to SOPHIE, following the DJ and producers death this weekend (January 30).

articles.title: Zack Snyder's Justice League Teases Jared Leto's Return As The Joker - Empire
articles.description: Zack Snyder shares a teaser image of Jared Leto's role in the Justice League Snyder Cut. Read more at Empire.
articles.content: The upcoming Snyder Cut of Justice League remains an object of fascination. For years it was debated whether it even existed (it largely didnt, since its taken $70 million-plus to finish it all off, … [+1836 chars]

articles.title: Late 'Saved By The Bell' star Dustin Diamond's dying wish was to meet Tool bassist - NME
articles.description: The dying wish of Dustin Diamond, who played Screech in 'Saved By The Bell', was to meet Tool bassist Justin Chancellor.
articles.content:
The dying wish of late Saved By The Bell star Dustin Diamond was to meet Tool bassist Justin Chancellor, a close friend has revealed.
